REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0442 reute u f BC-KEIAISHA-ISSUING-12-M 03-09 0060

TEXT.TITLE: KEIAISHA ISSUING 12 MLN SWISS FRANC NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Keiaisha Co Ltd of Tokyo is issuing 12 mln Swiss francs of straight notes due March 26, 1992 with a 4-5/8 pct coupon, lead manager Gotthard Bank said. The notes can be called from September 26, 1989 at 101-1/4, declining semi-annually. The issue is guaranteed by the Kyowa Bank Ltd. REUTER
